member.name: T:Common.Logging.Serilog.CommonLoggingSink
member.summary: Routes all log events logged through Serilog into the Common.Logging infrastructure.

member.name: M:Common.Logging.Serilog.CommonLoggingSink.#ctor
member.summary: Creates this target using the default formatProvider.

member.name: T:Common.Logging.Serilog.SerilogLogger
member.summary: Concrete implementation of interface specific to Serilog 1.5.14
member.remarks: Unlike other logging libraries, Serilog is built with powerful structured event data in mind. http://serilog.net/
member.author: Aaron Mell

member.summary: Constructor

member.name: P:Common.Logging.Serilog.SerilogLogger.IsTraceEnabled
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this instance is trace enabled.
member.value: true if this instance is trace enabled; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Common.Logging.Serilog.SerilogLogger.Trace(System.Action{Common.Logging.FormatMessageHandler})
member.summary: Log a message with the level using a callback to obtain the message
member.remarks: Using this method avoids the cost of creating a message and evaluating message arguments that probably won't be logged due to loglevel settings.
member.param: A callback used by the logger to obtain the message if log level is matched

member.name: P:Common.Logging.Serilog.SerilogLogger.GlobalVariablesContext
member.summary: Returns the global context for variables

member.name: T:Common.Logging.Serilog.SerilogLoggerFactoryAdapter
member.summary: Routes log events to Common.Logging infrastructure.
member.example:
To route all events logged using serilog to Common.Logging, you need to add the folling appsettings
<add key="serilog:using" value="Common.Logging.Serilog1514" /> <add key="serilog:write-to:CommonLogging" />
member.author: Erich Eichinger

member.name: M:Common.Logging.Serilog.SerilogLoggerFactoryAdapter.#ctor(System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)
member.summary: Constructor for binary backwards compatibility with non-portable versions
member.param: The properties.

member.name: M:Common.Logging.Serilog.SerilogLoggerFactoryAdapter.#ctor(Common.Logging.Configuration.NameValueCollection)
member.summary: Constructor

member.name: M:Common.Logging.Serilog.SerilogLoggerFactoryAdapter.CreateLogger(System.String)
member.summary: Get a ILog instance by type name

member.name: T:Serilog.LoggerConfigurationEventLogExtensions
member.summary: Adds the WriteTo.CommonLogging() extension method to . This is required for XML Configuration to work in Common.Logging
member.author: Aaron Mell

member.name: M:Serilog.LoggerConfigurationEventLogExtensions.CommonLogging(Serilog.Configuration.LoggerSinkConfiguration)
member.summary: Adds a sink that writes log events to the Windows event log.
member.param: The logger configuration.
member.returns: Logger configuration, allowing configuration to continue.
